name: ThaiFriendly
description: ThaiFriendly Thai dating app lets you browse through profiles of Thai girls and Farang men all over Thailand! You can use your existing ThaiFriendly account or sign up with a new account for free.  Some of the features:  * Browse through 1 million+ active photo profiles * Search profiles all over Thailand * Double tap to send interest to members * Send messages or photos to members for free (Free members limited to 1 message per 10 minutes)  Additional features for premium subscribers:  * Unlimited messaging * Advanced search * See recent profile visitors, and other useful lists * Add more photos * See when users have read your message * Appear above free users in search * Set your status to appear offline * Selectively show your visits to some members but hide from the rest  The Thai Friendly app is free to use but there is an option to purchase a monthly subscription within the app. Subscriptions last for 1 month and automatically renew at $19.99/month if not cancelled. You can easily cancel by visiting payments.google.com - selecting Bills and Accounts and then selecting Cancel subscription.   Our privacy policy: https://www.thaifriendly.com/privacy.php  Our terms of use: https://www.thaifriendly.com/terms.php
